mapper.select: /** selTmpScheNadminScheMergeForToDay **/ select e.yyyymmdd, e.sche_gubn, e.apln_form_id, e.ad_id, e.ad_nm, e.ad_length, e.ad_order, e.ch_id, e.ch_no, e.ch_nm, e.brdcst_dt, e.start_dt, e.end_dt, e.emgy_yn from ( select d.yyyymmdd, d.sche_gubn, d.apln_form_id, d.ad_id, d.ad_nm, d.ad_length, d.ad_order, d.ch_id, d.ch_no, d.ch_nm, d.brdcst_dt, d.start_dt, d.end_dt, 'n' as emgy_yn from bms_dd_ad_tmp_res_sche d where brdcst_dt = #{brdcst_dt} and sche_gubn = '1' and not exists ( select c.yyyymmdd, c.sche_gubn, c.apln_form_id, c.ad_id, c.ad_nm, c.ad_length, c.ad_order, c.ch_id, c.ch_no, c.ch_nm, c.brdcst_dt, c.start_dt, c.end_dt from ( select a.yyyymmdd, a.sche_gubn, a.apln_form_id, a.ad_id, a.ad_nm, a.ad_length, a.ad_order, a.ch_id, a.ch_no, a.ch_nm, a.brdcst_dt, a.start_dt, a.end_dt from ( select yyyymmdd, sche_gubn, apln_form_id, ad_id, ad_nm, ad_length, ad_order, ch_id, ch_no, ch_nm, brdcst_dt, start_dt, end_dt from bms_dd_ad_tmp_res_sche where brdcst_dt = #{brdcst_dt} and sche_gubn = '1' ) a join ( select yyyymmdd, apln_form_id, ad_id, ad_nm, ad_length, '1'::text as ad_order, ch_id, ch_no, ch_nm, brdcst_dt, start_dt, end_dt from bms_dd_admin_ad_sche where brdcst_dt = #{brdcst_dt} ) b on a.brdcst_dt = b.brdcst_dt and ( substr(to_char(to_timestamp(a.start_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyyMMddHH24MISS'),1,10) <= substr(to_char(to_timestamp(b.start_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyyMMddHH24MISS'),1,10) and substr(to_char(to_timestamp(b.start_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyyMMddHH24MISS'),1,10) < substr(to_char(to_timestamp(a.end_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyyMMddHH24MISS'),1,10) ) or substr(to_char(to_timestamp(b.start_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyyMMddHH24MISS'),1,10) = substr(to_char(to_timestamp(a.start_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyyMMddHH24MISS'),1,10) --and substr(to_char(to_timestamp(a.start_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyyMMddHH24MISS'),1,10) < <= substr(to_char(to_timestamp(b.start_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyyMMddHH24MISS'),1,10) --and substr(to_char(to_timestamp(b.start_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyyMMddHH24MISS'),1,10) = substr(to_char(to_timestamp(a.start_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyyMMddHH24MISS'),1,10) ) c where c.apln_form_id = d.apln_form_id and c.ad_id = d.ad_id and c.ch_id = d.ch_id and c.ch_no = d.ch_no ) union all select c.yyyymmdd, c.sche_gubn, c.apln_form_id, c.ad_id, c.ad_nm, c.ad_length, c.ad_order, c.ch_id, c.ch_no, c.ch_nm, c.brdcst_dt, c.start_dt, c.end_dt, c.emgy_yn from ( select b.yyyymmdd, a.sche_gubn, b.apln_form_id, b.ad_id, b.ad_nm, b.ad_length, b.ad_order, b.ch_id, b.ch_no, b.ch_nm, b.brdcst_dt, b.start_dt, b.end_dt, b.emgy_yn from ( select yyyymmdd, sche_gubn, apln_form_id, ad_id, ad_nm, ad_length, ad_order, ch_id, ch_no, ch_nm, brdcst_dt, start_dt, end_dt from bms_dd_ad_tmp_res_sche where brdcst_dt = #{brdcst_dt} and sche_gubn = '1' ) a join ( select yyyymmdd, apln_form_id, ad_id, ad_nm, ad_length, '1'::text as ad_order, ch_id, ch_no, ch_nm, brdcst_dt, start_dt, end_dt, emgy_yn from bms_dd_admin_ad_sche where brdcst_dt = #{brdcst_dt} ) b on a.brdcst_dt = b.brdcst_dt and ( substr(to_char(to_timestamp(a.start_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyyMMddHH24MISS'),1,10) <= substr(to_char(to_timestamp(b.start_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyyMMddHH24MISS'),1,10) and substr(to_char(to_timestamp(b.start_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyyMMddHH24MISS'),1,10) < substr(to_char(to_timestamp(a.end_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyyMMddHH24MISS'),1,10) ) or substr(to_char(to_timestamp(b.start_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyyMMddHH24MISS'),1,10) = substr(to_char(to_timestamp(a.start_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyyMMddHH24MISS'),1,10) --and substr(to_char(to_timestamp(a.start_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyyMMddHH24MISS'),1,10) <= substr(to_char(to_timestamp(b.start_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyyMMddHH24MISS'),1,10) --and substr(to_char(to_timestamp(b.start_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyyMMddHH24MISS'),1,10) = substr(to_char(to_timestamp(a.start_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyyMMddHH24MISS'),1,10) ) c group by c.yyyymmdd, c.sche_gubn, c.apln_form_id, c.ad_id, c.ad_nm, c.ad_length, c.ad_order, c.ch_id, c.ch_no, c.ch_nm, c.brdcst_dt, c.start_dt, c.end_dt, c.emgy_yn ) e group by e.yyyymmdd, e.sche_gubn, e.apln_form_id, e.ad_id, e.ad_nm, e.ad_length, e.ad_order, e.ch_id, e.ch_no, e.ch_nm, e.brdcst_dt, e.start_dt, e.end_dt, e.emgy_yn order by e.start_dt, e.ch_no, e.ad_order

/** selTmpScheNadminScheMergeForNextDay **/ select e.yyyymmdd, e.sche_gubn, e.apln_form_id, e.ad_id, e.ad_nm, e.ad_length, e.ad_order, e.ch_id, e.ch_no, e.ch_nm, e.brdcst_dt, e.start_dt, e.end_dt, e.emgy_yn from ( select d.yyyymmdd, d.sche_gubn, d.apln_form_id, d.ad_id, d.ad_nm, d.ad_length, d.ad_order, d.ch_id, d.ch_no, d.ch_nm, d.brdcst_dt, d.start_dt, d.end_dt, 'n' as emgy_yn from bms_dd_ad_tmp_res_sche d where brdcst_dt = #{brdcst_dt} and sche_gubn = '2' and not exists ( select c.yyyymmdd, c.sche_gubn, c.apln_form_id, c.ad_id, c.ad_nm, c.ad_length, c.ad_order, c.ch_id, c.ch_no, c.ch_nm, c.brdcst_dt, c.start_dt, c.end_dt from ( select a.yyyymmdd, a.sche_gubn, a.apln_form_id, a.ad_id, a.ad_nm, a.ad_length, a.ad_order, a.ch_id, a.ch_no, a.ch_nm, a.brdcst_dt, a.start_dt, a.end_dt from ( select yyyymmdd, sche_gubn, apln_form_id, ad_id, ad_nm, ad_length, ad_order, ch_id, ch_no, ch_nm, brdcst_dt, start_dt, end_dt from bms_dd_ad_tmp_res_sche where brdcst_dt = #{brdcst_dt} and sche_gubn = '2' ) a join ( select yyyymmdd, apln_form_id, ad_id, ad_nm, ad_length, '1'::text as ad_order, ch_id, ch_no, ch_nm, brdcst_dt, start_dt, end_dt from bms_dd_admin_ad_sche where brdcst_dt = #{brdcst_dt} ) b on a.brdcst_dt = b.brdcst_dt and ( substr(to_char(to_timestamp(a.start_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyyMMddHH24MISS'),1,10) <= substr(to_char(to_timestamp(b.start_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyyMMddHH24MISS'),1,10) and substr(to_char(to_timestamp(b.start_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyyMMddHH24MISS'),1,10) < substr(to_char(to_timestamp(a.end_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyyMMddHH24MISS'),1,10) ) or substr(to_char(to_timestamp(b.start_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyyMMddHH24MISS'),1,10) = substr(to_char(to_timestamp(a.start_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyyMMddHH24MISS'),1,10) ) c where c.apln_form_id = d.apln_form_id and c.ad_id = d.ad_id and c.ch_id = d.ch_id and c.ch_no = d.ch_no ) union all select c.yyyymmdd, c.sche_gubn, c.apln_form_id, c.ad_id, c.ad_nm, c.ad_length, c.ad_order, c.ch_id, c.ch_no, c.ch_nm, c.brdcst_dt, c.start_dt, c.end_dt, c.emgy_yn from ( select b.yyyymmdd, a.sche_gubn, b.apln_form_id, b.ad_id, b.ad_nm, b.ad_length, b.ad_order, b.ch_id, b.ch_no, b.ch_nm, b.brdcst_dt, b.start_dt, b.end_dt, b.emgy_yn from ( select yyyymmdd, sche_gubn, apln_form_id, ad_id, ad_nm, ad_length, ad_order, ch_id, ch_no, ch_nm, brdcst_dt, start_dt, end_dt from bms_dd_ad_tmp_res_sche where brdcst_dt = #{brdcst_dt} and sche_gubn = '2' ) a join ( select yyyymmdd, apln_form_id, ad_id, ad_nm, ad_length, '1'::text as ad_order, ch_id, ch_no, ch_nm, brdcst_dt, start_dt, end_dt, emgy_yn from bms_dd_admin_ad_sche where brdcst_dt = #{brdcst_dt} ) b on a.brdcst_dt = b.brdcst_dt and ( substr(to_char(to_timestamp(a.start_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyyMMddHH24MISS'),1,10) <= substr(to_char(to_timestamp(b.start_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyyMMddHH24MISS'),1,10) and substr(to_char(to_timestamp(b.start_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyyMMddHH24MISS'),1,10) < substr(to_char(to_timestamp(a.end_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyyMMddHH24MISS'),1,10) ) or substr(to_char(to_timestamp(b.start_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyyMMddHH24MISS'),1,10) = substr(to_char(to_timestamp(a.start_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyyMMddHH24MISS'),1,10) ) c group by c.yyyymmdd, c.sche_gubn, c.apln_form_id, c.ad_id, c.ad_nm, c.ad_length, c.ad_order, c.ch_id, c.ch_no, c.ch_nm, c.brdcst_dt, c.start_dt, c.end_dt, c.emgy_yn ) e group by e.yyyymmdd, e.sche_gubn, e.apln_form_id, e.ad_id, e.ad_nm, e.ad_length, e.ad_order, e.ch_id, e.ch_no, e.ch_nm, e.brdcst_dt, e.start_dt, e.end_dt, e.emgy_yn order by e.start_dt, e.ch_no, e.ad_order
